title.rendered: Great News for All Cinema Fans: KinoPoisk App Renewal

content.rendered:
The most successful movie resource in CIS, KinoPoisk,  has a list of important updates in the applications. Now users can:

  • add cinemas to “My cinemas list”
  • purchase tickets, also available in Passbook
  • filter movies genres
  • sort cinemas list by the showtime
  • for iOS: iOS6 and iPhone 5 support

iOS version is also already on air https://itunes.apple.com/ru/app/kinopoisk/id477718890?mt=8

Android version is available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.kinopoisk&hl=en
